text: Mostafa bedre Dean was involved with
Hezbollah almost since the group was
founded in the early eighties he was
reportedly injured fighting the Israelis
during the Israeli invasion of Beirut in
1982 he was also suspected of
involvement in activities outside of
Lebanon and imprisoned in Kuwait for his
suspected involvement in Bombay attacks
there he only managed to escape
Kuwaiti his Kuwaiti prison in 1990 when
Saddam invaded Kuwait at which point he
reportedly rejoined Hezbollah's ranks
Hezbollah was still fighting the Israeli
occupation of Lebanon in 2008 aim at
McNiel one of the most senior military
commanders in hezbollah was assassinated
in Damascus after which it was reported
that bad Redeem took his place we know
for sure that he was a senior military
commander in hezbollah and of course he
had a prominent role in Hezbollah's
operations in Syria where Hezbollah have
been supporting the regime of President
Bashar al-assad since the Civil War
there he is also accused has been
indicted actually by the Special
Tribunal for Lebanon and the
assassination of the former Lebanese
Prime Minister Rafik Hariri in 2005 and
was being tried in absentia before his
assassination
